#include<iostream>
#include<math.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
#define endl '\n'
#define a long long int 
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	std::ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
	int t,x,m,n,i;
	a c;
	int *p;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		x=0;
		c=0;
		cin>>n>>m;
		p=new int[n];
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			cin>>p[i];
			if(i<m)
			c+=p[i];
			if(i>=m)
			c-=ceil(p[i]/2);
		}
		if(c<0)
		x=1;
		if(x==0)
		cout<<"VICTORY"<<endl;
		else
		cout<<"DEFEAT"<<endl;
	}
	system("pause");
	return 0;
}
